about_the_game:
TechDev Tycoon is an innovative technology company management simulator that takes you into the exciting world of high technology and artificial intelligence. Become the head of your own company and immerse yourself in the exciting process of creating and developing advanced devices and neural networks.



Key features of the game:

Design and develop a wide range of technical devices, including monitors, processors, motherboards, refrigerators, RAM, hard disks and other, very different equipment. Show off your engineering skills and create tech that will revolutionize the industry.

Develop different types of neural networks such as text generators, image generators, translators, photo analyzers, maybe even military neural networks and Super AI. Discover the limitless possibilities of artificial intelligence and create neural networks that will change the world.

Build offices of different sizes and factories to produce machinery. Expand your company, hire employees and optimize production processes for maximum efficiency.

Develop your own operating systems. Become a software leader and set new standards in the industry.

Compete with your competitors, contract with vendors and participate in events. Take on the challenge of the dynamic technology market and prove that your company is the best in the business.

Explore new technologies, improve your technology, operating systems and AI. Keep up to date with the latest trends and innovations to always stay one step ahead of the competition.

Create your own cryptocurrency and mining equipment. Become part of the blockchain revolution and benefit from decentralized financial systems.

"TechDev Tycoon" offers deep and immersive gameplay for casual players and strategy enthusiasts alike. With detailed customization of techniques, neural networks and operating systems, you can fully immerse yourself in the world of high technology.

Develop your company and create innovative products that will change the world. Start your journey to technological domination today!

name: TechDev Tycoon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-Core processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Quad-Core processor, 3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: TechDev Tycoon is a technology company management simulator where you will be at the helm of your own technology business. Create all kinds of tech, cryptocurrencies, AI and OS, expand production, compete with competitors and explore new technologies to become the industry leader.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Indonesian, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish
